get.description: Export profanity words
Get profanity words group.

parameters.description:
The action when same words already exists
REPLACE: replace all same words with imported false positives and false negatives, existing non-imported words won't be removed
FULLREPLACE: replace all words with imported data and remove existing non-imported words, list words will be exactly same with imported data
LEAVEOUT: ignore imported same words, false positives and false negatives won't be replaced with imported data'
parameters.name: action

parameters.description: When showResult=true, this endpoint with returns imported words result
parameters.name: showResult

204.description: No Content returned when showResult=false or not defined
